lom:description.lom:string: This handbook looks at reasons for the gender gap in undergraduate science and engineering classes and makes suggestions for improving it. Included are suggestions for communication styles in the classroom, class size and organization, grading strategies, test formats, lab planning, faculty availability and more. This is good resource for teachers of SMET disciplines in college and high school that want to improve upon gender equity in the classroom.

lom:title.lom:string: Achieving Gender Equity in Science Classrooms: A Guide for Faculty
